title: Game Utilities
intro: `Game.utils` is an object holding some utility functions, mostly used by the private API, but nothing holds you back from using them. This API may change quickly (as you're not really supposed to use it), so, be warned!

children.name: getScene
children.description: Get a Scene by the given identifier.

arguments.name: identifier
arguments.description:
An identifier for a Scene:

> * Integer: the index in the scene list.
> * String: The name of the Scene.

children.name: toRadians
children.description: Convert an amount of degrees to radians.

arguments.name: degrees
arguments.description: The amount of degrees to convert.

children.name: toDegrees
children.description: Convert an amount of radians to degrees.

arguments.name: radians
arguments.description: The amount of radians to convert.
